overview: Adam Farkas is a 40 years old photographer, obsessed with the idea of creating something new, an erotic experimental movie, that will shock the public opinion. When he finds out that a model was murdered, arises in him a primordial sexual instinct that attracts him to the murderer. He will be obsessed with finding the killer, until all the demons inside and outside him will show up. He later meets a charming model Evan, and very soon he realizes Evan is hiding a big secret.
title: Don't Touch Here
